Squizzy::

She heard Zardus message. She wasn't a fighter, but she could use her 
brain instead of her brawn. She ran through the lab and found the 
tranquilizer dart gun. She loaded it up with a full magazine and 
grabbed two more boxes just in case.  She didn't have the killer 
instinct like most bots, but that didn't mean she couldn't defend 
herself or her base.

She ran out and stood outside the entrance. She used her scanner and 
started looking for the attacking bots.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Alliance Base/WarMachine::
> 
> Zardus frowns as the Alliance base shakes a bit, glancing down on 
his 
> scanners. A bot had appeared out of no where, and had opened fire 
on 
> WarMachine. Visuals reported that eight other bots were moving 
behind 
> the base, but they were obviouslty illusions, since they didn't 
> register on scanners.
> 
> "Come with me," he says to Najah, walking out of the lan and 
running 
> of down a hallway.
> 
> "Alliance troops," he says into his comm, "The base is under attack 
> by one bot. More may be cloaked. If you'll be defending the base, 
> don't let any of them past you. Some of the bots are holograms, so 
> use your scanners."
> 
> He orders the Alliance base's computer to begin a cloak scan, the 
> scanners getting to work as he heads for the exit.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Recieving Zardus' transmission, Reptilica sighs, jumping to his 
feet 
> and pulling out his gun.
> 
> He runs out of the bridge, heading for the exit
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica passes Bloodystrike as Bloodystrike recieves Zardus' 
> transmission. The Alliance bot spins around, following Reptilica.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The Alliance base detects weapon fire, the autoguns firing at Inu.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> WarMachine roars as lances strike him in the back, spinning around 
to 
> fire missiles at Inu from his shoulder missile launchers. His good 
> arm was now charred from the blast, the hand disabled.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "RYO D" <striderzero1@h...> wrote:
> > ::Koj::
> > Koj watch WarMachine thinking come on stupid alittle closer.Koj 
> waits as 
> > WarMachine reaches for the pod waiting till he gets a firm grip 
on 
> it. Koj 
> > slams on the detonator and watches as 5 pods explode with a fury 
> enough to 
> > shake the base.
> > 
> > ::Inu-Yasha::
> > Inu-Yasha Uncloaks "Anybody want to come out and play everyone 
> Charge."
> > Inu takes a lock on WarMachine and Fires 5 lancers at him.
> > 
> > ::The Holocubes project::
> > The Cubes Project a 8 heavy armed warriors running out of the 
woods 
> Fireing 
> > on the far side of the base. That being opposite side Koj is on.
